main_definition: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets, a language used to describe the presentation of web pages written in HTML or XML.

meanings_and_examples.example: When creating websites, developers use CSS alongside HTML.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Cascading Style Sheets, a language used to describe the presentation of web pages written in HTML or XML.
meanings_and_examples.example: I need to learn CSS so I can style my website'utimately making it more appealing and user-friendly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A popular nickname for someone who is cool, stylish, or fashionable
meanings_and_examples.example: She has a unique sense of style that makes her stand out. She really knows how to put together an awesome 'css' look!
